name: The Earthwound
notes: quest rares take 1min to respawn, not a bad idea to wait for them

name: Wanted: The Boroughbreaker
notes: quest rares take 1min to respawn, not a bad idea to wait for them

name: Delver's Call: Kriegval's Rest
ratingJustification: very good monster XP, good speed
notes: as with all delves, these are prime congested XP but can be slightly less efficient than speed questing

name: Delver's Call: Fungal Folly
ratingJustification: annoying delve layouts, bad monster xp gains
notes: as with all delves, these are prime congested XP but can be slightly less efficient than speed questing

name: Hope, An Anomaly
ratingJustification: super efficient questing, right alongside MSQ
notes: HIGHLY recommended to do, it's right alongside MSQ and good XP

name: Seven Soldiers
ratingJustification: pretty short quests, only the final quest has issues with congestion

name: Spores of Dread
ratingJustification: single quest chain which will have extreme issues with congestion

name: Remember Me, Earthen (full)
ratingJustification: this area can be very awkward if congested, but quests are very condensed. I recommend stopping after Who Runs this Fine Establishment? (or whenever you leave the Kobold area) as there is a very long single-quest chain afterwards

name: Remember Me, Earthen (early leave)
ratingJustification: if you leave before the long single-quest chains, it's super good xp per time, but can still suffer from congestion
notes: This is if you leave the area after the Kobold area

name: All Ore Nothing
ratingJustification: single-quest chains, but the quests are all very easy and there won’t be many issues with congestion here

name: For the Love of Gems
ratingJustification: single-quest chains, not great XP, a bit annoying

name: Opalfront
ratingJustification: lots of travel, but good quests, there may be some congestion issues though

name: Birdman of the Three Shields
ratingJustification: questline is in narnia + the eel quest is AWFUL

name: The Hermit
ratingJustification: very fast quests, minor congestion issues, good xp

name: Lost Lord of the Storm
ratingJustification: super good hub, quests are relatively quick and the 3 rare mob quests are HUGE xp

name: A Titanic Expedition
ratingJustification: quick quests, starting quest is obtained alongside doing another good questline

name: Brotherhood in the Skolzgal Wood
ratingJustification: the only good thing about this questline is that the quest names are funny

name: How Scandalous!
ratingJustification: extremely fast quests, also unlocks the second half of the chain in The Ringing Deeps later on

name: Delves: The Waterworks (at T3)
ratingJustification: good layout and good monster xp
notes: as with all delves, these are prime congested XP but can be slightly less efficient than speed questing

name: Delves: Dread Pit (at T3)
ratingJustification: overall really nasty layouts with lots of high hp mobs to kill
notes: as with all delves, these are prime congested XP but can be slightly less efficient than speed questing

name: Fearbreaker
ratingJustification: starts off a bit annoying but speeds up and overall good

name: Kobold Work Crew
ratingJustification: fast quests, good xp, 0 travel, though it has a puzzle so if you have 0iq gl

name: Tired of Rest
ratingJustification: lots of single-quest chains that give abhorrent XP

name: Frolicking in the Fetid Grotto
ratingJustification: these quests are fast, downside is that you go out to do the chain and it’s only 3 quests
notes: Recommended to do with Fearbreaker questline

name: Envenomed Vision
ratingJustification: quick quests with a crazy triple quest cluster
notes: Recommended to do with Fearbreaker questline

name: Dread in the Den
ratingJustification: decent XP but annoying quests

name: Revenge in the Rumbling Wastes
ratingJustification: close by, semi-fast quests, but I have a fear that this quest can have issues with launch congestion. If you’re alone here, it could be very good

name: Broken Tools
ratingJustification: very fast quests, only 1 minor congestion issue

name: Abysmal Extraction
startingLocation: southwest of Gundargaz near the elevator
ratingJustification: fast quests, good xp
notes: There's an intro quest SW of Gundargaz, unsure if it's needed or not

name: Into the Fog
ratingJustification: first and last quest is a bit longer, but overall good

name: Rampage at Nibelgaz Mine
ratingJustification: fast and simple quests, main downside is the backtrack in the final quests is a lot of wasted time

name: Magna-nificence
ratingJustification: literally just 4 quests all at once; 3 of which are in the same area, amazing group of quests
